attributes.additional_details: Let's return to normal and stop all the scaremongering of the public whilst the whole time the goverment & MP's are ignoring all there own rules ..let's return to full normality as we all know this pandemic is being used for nothing more than control and to remove rights bill after bill .. enough is enough
attributes.background: Repeal the Coronavirus Act , Mask Mandates & stop the Covid Pass

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592632
